Name: Tomb Raider Survival/Collector's Edition
Overview:
This collector's edition includes:
Tomb Raider
Tomb Raider: Hitman: Absolution Weapon Pack 1 (DLC)
8 inch posable figurine of main character Lara Croft made by Play Arts Kai
15x19" double sided map/poster
5x7" lithographic print on heavy stock depicting Lara Croft
Three iron-on badges featuring icons from the game
Soundtrack disc (10 tracks)
Collectible "Survival" metal tin that contains the game and all above extras
